column4: Has anyone noticed hard drive failure lately for external hard drives?  I seem to randomly get I/O errors.  I've even gone so far as to put in a replacement hard drive with the same err.
might be a connection problem, or a damaged enclosure.

Piet: he mentioned that a replacement disk gave similar errors, so i imagine the problem lies within the enclosure itself, or with the connection to the computer. of course, two bad disks in a row isn't completely unheard of :-)
